entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a student who is bitter about the amount of homework given by Professor Vector.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who catches up with Ron and Harry, and is described as 'brightly'.

entities.name: professor vector
entities.description: Professor Vector is introduced as a teacher who did not give any homework to his students.

entities.name: professor mcgona-gall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as an example of how Professor Vector should be, but sounding 'much more like' her.

entities.name: the weasley
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned as a family that Ron belongs to.

relationships.description: Ron is given homework by Professor Vector.
Hermione catches up with Ron in the entrance hall.
Professor McGonagall is used as an example of how Professor Vector should be.
